text: @realDonaldTrump Hey donny, why not step aside & let governor Cuomo run the Pandemic, he has so many great ideas than anything coming out of the wh. NO bailing out cruise lines, there’s a loan for that, hotels, INCLUDING YOURs, loan, airlines, LOANS. Get the cash to the Americans.
